payment_terms.text: Payment Terms. Each party shall provide the other party with allamounts due under this Agreement for the prior calendar quarter within 30 daysafter the end of each calendar quarter during the Term. Each payment shall beaccompanied by a statement detailing the amount of applicable gross revenuereceived, the calculation of the amount due to the other party and the amount ofthe payment accompanying such statement.
